mapper.select: SELECT c.name AS name, c.country_id AS countryId, c.country_code3 AS countryCode3, cs.year AS year, cs.population AS population, cs.gdp AS gdp FROM countries c JOIN country_stats cs ON c.country_id = cs.country_id JOIN ( SELECT country_id, MAX(gdp * 1.0 / population) AS max_ratio FROM country_stats WHERE population > 0 GROUP BY country_id ) max_cs ON cs.country_id = max_cs.country_id AND (cs.gdp * 1.0 / cs.population) = max_cs.max_ratio ORDER BY c.name
